sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { auth } from "../firebase-config"; import { signOut, onAuthStateChanged } from "firebase/auth"; const Orders = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState(null); const [currentDate, setCurrentDate] = useState(""); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [search, setSearch] = useState(""); const [showAddModal, setShowAddModal] = useState(false); const [newOrder, setNewOrder] = useState({ customer: "", email: "", status: "Pending", date: "", amount: "", items: 1 }); const [orderList, setOrderList] = useState(orders); useEffect(() => { const unsubscribe = onAuthStateChanged(auth, (user) => { if (user) { setUser(user); setCurrentDate(new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' })); } else { navigate("/login"); } }); return () => unsubscribe(); }, [navigate]); const handleSignOut = async () => { try { await signOut(auth); navigate("/login"); } catch (error) { console.error("Error signing out:", error); } }; const handleNavigation = (route) => { navigate(route); }; const orders = [ { id: "#ORD-001", customer: "John Doe", email: "john@example.com", status: "Delivered", date: "2023-05-15", amount: "$1,200", items: 3 }, { id: "#ORD-002", customer: "Jane Smith", email: "jane@example.com", status: "Processing", date: "2023-05-14", amount: "$850", items: 2 }, { id: "#ORD-003", customer: "Mike Johnson", email: "mike@example.com", status: "Shipped", date: "2023-05-13", amount: "$2,100", items: 1 }, { id: "#ORD-004", customer: "Sarah Wilson", email: "sarah@example.com", status: "Delivered", date: "2023-05-12", amount: "$950", items: 4 }, { id: "#ORD-005", customer: "David Brown", email: "david@example.com", status: "Pending", date: "2023-05-11", amount: "$1,500", items: 2 }, { id: "#ORD-006", customer: "Emily Davis", email: "emily@example.com", status: "Cancelled", date: "2023-05-10", amount: "$750", items: 1 }, ]; // Search filter const filteredOrders = orderList.filter(o => o.customer.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()) || o.email.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()) || o.id.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()) ); // Add Order Modal handlers const handleAddOrder = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setOrderList([ ...orderList, { ...newOrder, id: `#ORD-00${orderList.length + 1}` } ]); setShowAddModal(false); setNewOrder({ customer: "", email: "", status: "Pending", date: "", amount: "", items: 1 }); }; if (!user) { return (
Loading...
); } return (

setNewOrder({ ...newOrder, customer: e.target.value })} required /> setNewOrder({ ...newOrder, email: e.target.value })} required /> setNewOrder({ ...newOrder, date: e.target.value })} required /> setNewOrder({ ...newOrder, amount: e.target.value })} required /> setNewOrder({ ...newOrder, items: e.target.value })} required />
)}
); }; export default Orders;
